title: Getting a leaverbuster
body: Hey riot can you please remove the low priority queue off me because I did nothing wrong I got it after the game of Aram which i kept disconecting and couldnt connect back into. Well I could but I could barely move with my champion.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=mrichardist,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=ogvZE9xc,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-01-16T20:15:07.547+0000)
>
> how long i can hane that leaving panalty remove from my account
Say, did you fix the problem you're having with disconnecting?
